titleStmt.title: brahmānandiya sāraṃ and an unknown text

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is a commentary on advaitasiddhi, a philosophical text. On the front guard folio in the left margin has bā and Number 14 written in pencil. Then title is written: Brahmānandiya sāraṃ brahmānandi Brahmānandiya sāraṃ upper right margin of the other blank folio. Folio are fragile. Back side of the other blank folio; Line 1 - vṛkṣasyasvagato?daḥ pūrvatra vṛkṣavilādibhiḥ vṛkṣāntaśāstrajāti? (Broken folio gap of a few letters.)lāditaḥ tathā sadyasvati bedatrayaprāpta Line 2 - nnīvāryate śrotṛvadharaṇaścet vṛṣaiñaistṛbhi kṛ? (Broken folio gap of a few letters.) khara jānya?ptakuṭārthade? āda bhakṣaṇe āta sātatya gamane . The second text is unknown. Title of the text is not found but the text is philosophical text.

msItem.title: brahmānandiya sāraṃ
msItem.author: brahmānandasarasvati

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum Vol 1 p.105. The title accord to New Catalogus Catalogorum is advaita siddhasiddhantavidyotana.

msItem.incipit: (1v 1) yadantardhyānamāhātmyādanuyāmi sarasvtiṃ tatkāyyeti tatnāśa nāśyetyarthaḥ pāketi pra (1v 2) pte iti upalakṣītasya nāśa iti vyavahāre upalaṣaṇasya pratiyogitvenābhāvāt ….
msItem.explicit: (23v 3) cet aścandramaṇi maṇiṣu ramaṇījātyā tathā viśvadaṃ .
msItem.finalRubric: (23v 3) iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryya parmā (23v 4) nandasarasvatibrahmac[ā]riśca śrībarhmānandasarasvativiracitāyāmadvaitasiddhiṭīkhāyāṃ caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ hariḥ oṃ

msItem.title: Unknown (philosophy)
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) śrīnārāyaṇatīrthānāṃ gurūṇāñcaraṇasamratiH? ahaṃ tavaiva vyāku (1v 2) rve sārasvatasarasvatiḥ tadaṃgatayā mumukṣubhiranuṣṭheye
msItem.explicit: (23r 2) dhvāntabhaṃgāya [gap of a letter due to wormhole] vaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ sārasvatamudrekaprasaṃgāt dhvāntadhikakriyāyācāryacandrikayāpariccaido saṃ (23r 3) sthitāḥ .

support.p: palm leaf as guard folio. Front folio is broken.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin of the verso of the folio. Two texts are numbered separately.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ śrīnārāyaṇanityānāṃ pādāṃbujarajo bhaje yadantardhyānamāhātmyādanuyāmi sarasvtiṃ tatkāyyeti tatnāśa nāśyetyarthaḥ pāketi pra (1v 2) pte iti upalakṣītasya nāśa iti vyavahāre upalaṣaṇasya pratiyogitvenābhāvāt ….
(23v 3) cet aścandramaṇi maṇiṣu ramaṇījātyā tathā viśvadaṃ . iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryya parmā (23v 4) nandasarasvatibrahmacAriśca śrībarhmānandasarasvativiracitāyāmadvaitasiddhiṭīkhāyāṃ caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ hariḥ oṃ

(1v 1) śrīmadviśvādhiṣṭhānaparamahaṃsasatguru śrīeāmacandrāya namaḥ . śrīmahāgaṇapataye namaḥ . śrīnārāyaṇatīrthānāṃ gurūṇāñcaraṇasamratiH? ahaṃ tavaiva vyāku (1v 2) rve sārasvatasarasvatiḥ tadaṃgatayā mumukṣubhiranuṣṭheye
(23r 1) apekṣitadī[gap of a letter due to wormhole] ditatatyā cakitaṃ śaktiṃ vinā abhidhatte bodhayati .. ta [gap of a letter due to wormhole] ssārasvatairatai? badrikācandrabhuṣaṇaiḥ duśanta (23r 2) dhvāntabhaṃgāya [gap of a letter due to wormhole] vaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ sārasvatamudrekaprasaṃgāt dhvāntadhikakriyāyācāryacandrikayāpariccaido saṃ (23r 3) sthitāḥ . oṃ dakṣiṇāryāya namaḥ …
